bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with dou zhen 痘疹 , smallpox with papules. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zi cao 紫草 quotes Jing yan hou fang 經驗後方 : 嬰童疹痘：三四日，隱隱將出未出，色赤便閉者 , “For children with papules and smallpox : when on the third and fourth day [papules and smallpox] are still dormant, when they are about to appear, but have not appeared, and when their complexion is red and they suffer from constipation”.
